languages.text: "Предки трехоких мон-кай решили подчинить себе силу Монолита душ, но раз за разом терпели неудачи. В конце концов они нашли способ совладать с его могуществом — ужасный, болезненный, непростительный. Они разбили Монолит на множество осколков и ослабили души, покоящиеся в нем. А затем..." {n}Арлекина сотрясает от гнева.{/n} "Затем они решили вживлять осколки в свои тела, чтобы усилить способности".

traits.locale_text: "Предки трехоких мон-кай решили подчинить себе силу Камня Душ, но раз за разом тепрели неудачи. В конце концов они нашли способ собладать с его могуществом — ужасный, болезненный, непростительный. Они разбили камень на множество осколков и ослабили души, покоящиеся в нем. А затем..." {n}Арлекина сотрясает от гнева.{/n} "Затем они решили вживлять осколки Камня Душ в свои тела, чтобы усилить способности".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith and, yet, suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards inside their bodies to empower their abilities."
languages.original_text: "Предки трехоких мон-кай решили подчинить себе силу Монолита душ, но раз за разом терпели неудачи. В конце концов они нашли способ совладать с его могуществом — ужасный, болезненный, непростительный. Они разбили Монолит на множество осколков и ослабили души, покоящиеся в нем. А затем..." {n}Арлекина сотрясает от гнева.{/n} "Затем они решили вживлять осколки в свои тела, чтобы усилить способности".

traits.locale_text: "The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith, yet suffered failure time and again. Eventually they discovered a way to harness this power — a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many slivers and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards of the Spirit Monolith inside their bodies to empower their abilities."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards inside their bodies to empower their abilities."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「三つ目モン＝ケイの父祖はスピリット・モノリスの力を意のままにしようとしたが、幾度とない失敗を経験したってこと。最終的にはこの力を利用する方法を見つけた。ひどいやり口だよ、拷問と言ってもいい、容赦ないやり口。奴らはモノリスを砕いて数多のかけらにし、中に込められた魂を弱体化させたんだ。そして…」{n}ハーレクィンは怒りで身体を震わせる。{/n}「そうして奴らはそのかけらを己の身体に埋め込み、能力を強化したんだ」
languages.original_text: "The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith and, yet, suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: 「三つ目モン＝ケイの父祖はスピリット・モノリスの力を意のままにしようとしたが、幾度とない失敗を経験したってこと。最終的にはこの力を利用する方法を見つけた。ひどいやり口だよ、拷問と言ってもいい、容赦ないやり口。奴らはモノリスを砕いて数多のかけらにし、中に込められた魂を弱体化させたんだ。そして…」{n}ハーレクィンは怒りで身体を震わせる。{/n}「そうして奴らはそのかけらを己の身体に埋め込み、能力を強化したんだ」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “那些三眼猴子的祖先打算控制巨型灵魂石的力量，但却一次又一次地失败。到了最后，他们找到了利用这种力量的方法——一种可怕的方法，一种充满痛苦、不可饶恕的方法。他们损毁了巨型灵魂石，把它化成了无数碎片，削弱了碎片中灵魂的力量之后……”{n}丑角的声音颤抖着，充满了愤怒。{/n}“之后，他们把那些碎片放在了他们自己的身体里，强化他们的力量。”
languages.original_text: "The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith and, yet, suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: “那些三眼猴子的祖先打算控制巨型灵魂石的力量，但却一次又一次地失败。到了最后，他们找到了利用这种力量的方法——一种可怕的方法，一种充满痛苦、不可饶恕的方法。他们损毁了巨型灵魂石，把它化成了无数碎片，削弱了碎片中灵魂的力量之后……”{n}丑角的声音颤抖着，充满了愤怒。{/n}“之后，他们把那些碎片放在了他们自己的身体里，强化他们的力量。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Les ancêtres de la mon-keigh à trois yeux ont longtemps cherché à s'approprier la puissance du Monolithe aux esprits, en vain. Ils ont fini par trouver un moyen de l'exploiter. Un moyen répugnant, atroce, impardonnable. Ils ont brisé le Monolithe en de nombreux fragments et affaibli les âmes qu'il abritait. Et ensuite... » {n}intervient l'Arlequin, tremblant de fureur.{/n} « Ensuite, ils ont incrusté ces fragments dans leurs propres corps. »
languages.original_text: "The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith and, yet, suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: « Les ancêtres de la mon-keigh à trois yeux ont longtemps cherché à s'approprier la puissance du Monolithe aux esprits, en vain. Ils ont fini par trouver un moyen de l'exploiter. Un moyen répugnant, atroce, impardonnable. Ils ont brisé le Monolithe en de nombreux fragments et affaibli les âmes qu'il abritait. Et ensuite... » {n}intervient l'arlequin, tremblant de fureur.{/n} « Ensuite, ils ont incrusté ces fragments dans leurs propres corps. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Los ancestros de la mon-keigh de tres ojos trataron de controlar el poder del Monolito Espiritual, mas fracasaron en todos sus intentos. Finalmente, descubrieron una forma de acceder a su poder; algo terrible, agónico e imperdonable: destruyeron el Monolito en incontables fragmentos y debilitaron las almas que contenía. Y después...». {n}El Arlequín tiembla de ira.{/n} «Después introdujeron sus fragmentos en sus cuerpos para reforzar sus capacidades».
languages.original_text: "The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith and, yet, suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: «Los ancestros de la mon-keigh de tres ojos trataron de controlar el poder del Monolito Espiritual, mas fracasaron en todos sus intentos. Finalmente, descubrieron una forma de acceder a su poder; algo terrible, agónico e imperdonable: destruyeron el Monolito en incontables fragmentos y debilitaron las almas que contenía. Y después...». {n}El Arlequín tiembla de ira.{/n} «Después introdujeron sus fragmentos en sus cuerpos para reforzar sus capacidades».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Die Ahnen des dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey wollten die Macht des Geistesmonoliths befehligen, und doch sind sie wieder und wieder gescheitert. Schließlich haben sie einen Weg gefunden, diese Macht zu nutzen. Einen grauenhaften Weg, qualvoll und unverzeihlich. Sie haben den Monolithen in unzählige Splitter zertrümmert und die Seelen darin geschwächt. Und dann ..." {n}Der Harlekin bebt vor Wut.{/n} "Dann haben sie die Splitter in ihre Körper eingesetzt, um ihre Fähigkeiten zu verstärken."
languages.original_text: "The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith and, yet, suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ahnen des dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey wollten die Macht des Geistesmonoliths befehligen, und doch sind sie wieder und wieder gescheitert. Schließlich haben sie einen Weg gefunden, diese Macht zu nutzen. Einen grauenhaften Weg, qualvoll und unverzeihlich. Sie haben den Monolithen in unzählige Splitter zertrümmert und die Seelen darin geschwächt. Und dann ..." {n}Der Harlekin bebt vor Wut.{/n} "Dann haben sie die Splitter in ihre Körper eingesetzt, um ihre Fähigkeiten zu verstärken."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Üç gözlü mon-keighin ataları, Ruh Monoliti'nin gücüne hükmetmeye çalışıp defalarca başarısız oldu. En nihayetinde ise bu güçten faydalanmanın bir yolunu keşfettiler. Korkunç bir yol, ızdıraplı ve affedilmez. Monolit'i pek çok ufak parçaya bölüp içindeki ruhların gücünü zayıflattılar. Ardından da..." {n}Arleken, hiddetle titriyor.{/n} "Ardından da kabiliyetlerine güç katmak için Ruh Monoliti'nin taşlarını kendi vücutlarının içine koydular."
languages.original_text: "The ancestors of the three-eyed mon-keigh sought to command the power of the Spirit Monolith and, yet, suffered failure time and again. Eventually, they discovered a way to harness this power: a terrible way, torturous and unforgivable. They shattered the Monolith into many shards and weakened the souls within. And then..." {n}The Harlequin trembles with fury.{/n} "Then they placed the shards inside their bodies to empower their abilities."

traits.locale_text: "Üç gözlü mon-keighin ataları, Ruh Monoliti'nin gücüne hükmetmeye çalışsa da defalarca başarısız olmuştu. Nihayetinde bu güçten faydalanmanın bir yolunu keşfettiler. Korkunç bir yoldu bu; ızdıraplı ve affedilmezdi. Monolit'i pek çok ufak parçaya bölüp içindeki ruhların gücünü zayıflattılar. Ardından da..." {n}Arleken, hiddetle titriyor.{/n} "Ardından da kendi kabiliyetlerine güç katmak için parçaları kendi vücutlarının içine koydular."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
